course.subject: ISOM
course.name: Supply Chain Management
course.description: Single node inventory control, supply chain network, demand management, manufacturing and replenishment in supply chains, information and coordination in supply chains, product variety management. For students in their third year (under three-year curriculum) or fourth year (under four-year curriculum) of study only. Other students should seek instructor’s approval for enrollment in the course.

reviews.author: M_1240
reviews.title: A great OM elective!
reviews.comment_content:
The content covered a mix of theory based concepts, practical applications as well as case studies.

Theory based concepts: Basic inventory models, calculation of inventory, risk pooling & postponement.
These are usually discusses in the online lectures.

Practical Applications: 2 Simulation games - both in-class to be done in groups

Case studies: Includes Zara, Yummy77 among others - usually discussed in-class.
Airbnb case to be done as a group project.
reviews.comment_teaching: The Prof makes the classes very interactive. He is clear with his explanations, be it in class or in the online videos. He always stops to ask questions and clarify doubts. He will slow down if you ask him to.
reviews.comment_grading:
The grading is transparent. Towards the end of the course, all the grades are released.

Inclass participation - 5% (participation cards are given out)
Midterm (open notes) - 30%
Final (open notes) - 45%
Simulation game (only final simulation game is counted) - 5%
Online Quizzes (1 for every online lecture) - 5%
Group Project - 10%
reviews.comment_workload:
The workload is manageable. Enough time is given for all the aspects of the course.

The online quizzes are usually due a week after they are released.

The groups can be formed on your own, so make sure to pick hardworking teammates and you're good.

reviews.author: iloveis
reviews.title: A MUST TAKE OM elective !!
reviews.comment_content: Different OM SCM concepts will be taught such as VMI, JIT, review model. The first part is a bit challenging as it involves some calculation related to different review model, but after midterm, the content is easy and no calculation, just some concepts. Prof uses blended learning approach that only requires us to attend only ONE lesson per week and watch some online video for the online quizzes (which is so easy). Overall, I think it is the best OM course that every OM major student should take ! The concepts are practical and really useful.
reviews.comment_teaching: Ki Ling is passionate about teaching, he said he will only teach concepts which are practical and useful which indeed is the case here for the course. He made some jokes during class and the overall atmosphere is very good !
reviews.comment_grading:
Ki Ling Grading is always excellent.

Midterm + Project + Final + participation (answer 3 questions during class to get full credit)+ Group project + online quizzes (get full mark in any 5 )  + Simulation game

Seems to have many tasks to do, but most of them are very easy. The workload is not great actually. For in class participation point, you only need to answer 3 question during class and prof will give you a card for 1 point. The online quiz is easy, everyone got full mark for that. Group project is about Amazon Go. The grading is mainly depends on midterm and final. Midterm is more difficult than final.

For me, project + sim game below mean 1 sd, full participation, full online quiz , midterm +0.5sd , final +1.5sd -> A
reviews.comment_workload: Relatively small for a 3 credit course.

reviews.author: KKKKK
reviews.title: ISOM 4770 Supply Chain Management
reviews.comment_content:
好像是在master也有教的，所以原本只讓final year student讀(怕其他讀不來)，不過third year student想讀也可以自行申請instructor approval，張教授都會批准。
透過一堆case去介紹supply chain management的概念如postponement, risk pooling, supply contract,如何制定safety stock等等(還有很多沒列舉)。基本上就是一堆case
reviews.comment_teaching:
Prof Cheung教學方式比較隨便，不介意同學看lecture video代替上課，不過要是去上課的就不可以做自己的事或者睡覺，不然他會叫你離開。
雖然課程都是圍繞case來教，不過他也不需要同學們去看/研究case，他會把所有case裡面的重點都放在ppt，有些部分會漏空要同學在課堂自行抄下。基本上抄下來就可以去考試了。
reviews.comment_grading:
由於考試出的很簡單的關係，導致Mean很高的一科。
Simulation Games  12.5 %
Final project   12.5 %  
In-class quiz   30 %
Final exam   45 %
quiz的mean是86%
project的mean是90%
simulation game的mean是92.5%
考試沒有公開分數不過不會低過85%
所以就是看誰比較小心，我final grading 87.73%拿B-
reviews.comment_workload:
很輕鬆的一科，quiz&final都是open book open notes, 考試只要看完lecture video把notes漏空的地方填滿就可以去考了。
Quiz考60min，20道MC。Final考105min，十幾道MC＋十一道short/long questions。我考試前一晚才開始看剩下來的video也剛好來得及。反正就是問題太容易，基本就考lecture video裡面的東西。
其餘就是simulation game玩完寫個report，project準備一個ppt短短說15分鐘就是整個sem的workload。
有上過Ki Ling Cheung課的都知道他的課很輕鬆，如果想輕輕鬆鬆拿3cred的就選他吧，如果想增加知識的可能需要再想想，這科不是沒東西學，不過他教的很簡單，所有case裡面的重點都列出來，13個case我一個都沒看過，他也沒要求同學去看。
